nodes.bodyText: I did not understand this test, looks not related to the changes that the PR introduced. At least you need to write one Transaction Marker into the managed ledger?
I think we should delete all transaction markers right? not only the commit marker.

The mark delete position of the cursor may be modified, it's better to avoid to all cursor.getMarkDeletedPosition()  twice, it might return a different position. So you can use a local variable to maintain the currentMarkDeletePosition.
Please release the ledger and cursor resources after the test.
